about_the_game:
Six- Ear Macaque: Awakening is a casual role-playing game based on the Chinese classic novel Journey to the West. The protagonist is one of the Six- Ear Macaque, is one of the "mixed four monkeys", ability and Sun Wukong equal. In the game, you will explore the legendary path of your destiny.

If you have any suggestions, please send me an E-mail: hjtyule@qq.com.

This game is independently developed by me. If you like this type, please add a wish list, which is very important to me.

Clouds scattered color, the sun and moon shake light

The magical power is boundless, and you can master different five-element spells in the game.

The magical power is boundless, and you can master different five-element magical power, posture and stick style in the game.

  • Fire attribute spell

  • Water attribute spell

  • Metallic attribute spell 

  • Wood attribute avatar

Five elements booty

The collocation of equipment with different attributes enhances the characters' own attributes.

Equipment can be upgraded by NPC Refining and Chemical Company.

The bowels of the heart mountain

Raging Fire Dungeon of inferno

It's a strange place, a lot of opportunities

A flower, a world, a tree, a floating life, welcome to the magic world of the true and unreal journey to the West!

Six- Ear Macaque will travel to a number of different styles of secret land, to explore the legend of their own destiny.

Demons and ghosts, each with his own magic

The road of growth of Six- Ear Macaque will encounter many powerful enemies and terrible opponents, and see Six- Ear Macaque fighting with heaven, fighting with the ground, Unique magical power, posture, and special stick style, cooperate with the five-element equipment system, strengthen the refining equipment system, and with the advancement of the task, kill all the demon kings and embark on Six- Ear Macaque destiny.

Six- Ear Macaque: Awakening is a casual role-playing game based on the Chinese classic novel Journey to the West. The protagonist is one of the Six- Ear Macaque, is one of the "mixed four monkeys", ability and Sun Wukong equal. In the game, you will explore the legendary path of your destiny.

The road of growth of Six- Ear Macaque will encounter many powerful enemies and terrible opponents, and see Six- Ear Macaque fighting with heaven, fighting with the ground, Unique magical power, posture, and special stick style, cooperate with the five-element equipment system, strengthen the refining equipment system, and with the advancement of the task, kill all the demon kings and embark on Six- Ear Macaque destiny.
legal_notice:
"Dear Steam Team,
We confirm that all third-party assets in [Six-Ear Macaque: Awakening] are properly licensed for commercial use. Attached are license agreements, attribution documentation. We’ve removed non-compliant assets and welcome further queries.
Sincerely, Ding Bin Bin
name: Six-Ear Macaque: Awakening

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: i5-8400/Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060/RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WIN7/WIN10/WIN11
  • Processor: i7-9700/Ryzen 5 5500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060/RX 5700XT/Arc A750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: Six- Ear Macaque: Awakening is a casual role-playing game based on the Chinese classic novel Journey to the West. The protagonist is one of the Six- Ear Macaque, is one of the "mixed four monkeys", ability and Sun Wukong equal. In the game, you will explore the legendary path of your destiny.
supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, English
*languages with full audio support
